name: Diebolt-Vallois Brut Rose
description: WS 91, 63% Pinot Noir, 27% Chardonnay, 10% Pinot Meunier WS: Deep in color and vinous in its red fruit, this is a spicy and compelling rosé. There's pristine strawberry flavor at its core, surrounded by accents of red grapefruit, blood orange and fennel. The wine's intensity rises like its bubbles from base note to high notes, leaving a pale red fruit ghosting in the finish.
